page.topic: How to Display a QR Code in a Report
page.description: You can generate and display QR codes in reports using a variety of methods.

section.title: Creating QR Codes using Calculated Fields

description.p: Calculated fields can be used to generate and display QR Codes in a Freeform report.

step.description: Create a new calculated field using the [qrcode_bitmap] function. The qrcode_bitmap function generates a QR Code for a specified character value. For example, the code below generates a QR Code for the "Contactname" field that is 300 x 300 pixels in size and stores it in a calculated field called "qrcode":
Insert your calculated field into your report. Make sure to size the field large enough to fit the generated QR Code.

description.p: In Layout Table Reports, you can easily display a QR Code by checking the *[ui:Display QRCode for text cell]* option in the Cell Contents dialog for a cell in the report. Alpha Anywhere will generate a QR Code based on the cell's contents.
Watch the video below for full step-by-step instructions on how to display a QR Code in a Layout Table Report.
